sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react"; const RequestNewTalentForm = () => { const [assignResumeDetails, setAssignResumeDetails] = useState({ firstname:"", lastname:"", email:"", streetaddress:"", city:"", region:"", postalcode:"", previousjobtitle:"", jobstartdate:"", jobenddate:"", about:"", fileupload:"" }) const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log({ assignResumeDetails }); const data = new FormData() data.append('firstname', assignResumeDetails.firstname); data.append('lastname', assignResumeDetails.lastname); data.append('email', assignResumeDetails.email); data.append('streetaddress', assignResumeDetails.streetaddress); data.append('city', assignResumeDetails.city); data.append('region', assignResumeDetails.region); data.append('postalcode', assignResumeDetails.postalcode); data.append('previousjobtitle', assignResumeDetails.previousjobtitle); data.append('jobstartdate', assignResumeDetails.jobstartdate); data.append('jobenddate', assignResumeDetails.jobenddate); data.append('about', assignResumeDetails.about); data.append('file', assignResumeDetails.fileupload); try { await fetch("http://localhost:5000/send", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify({ assignResumeDetails }), }) .then((res) => res.json()) .then(async (res) => { const resData = await res; console.log(resData); if (resData.status === "success") { alert("Message Sent"); } else if (resData.status === "fail") { alert("Message failed to send"); } }); } catch (error) { console.log(error.message); } setAssignResumeDetails({ fullname:"", email: "", phone:"", message:"" }); } const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setAssignResumeDetails({...assignResumeDetails, [name]:value }) } return (
